#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;


int main()
{
   long long int t,n;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--)
   {
       cin>>n;
       long long int a[n],ctr=0,i;
       for(i=0;i<n;++i)
       {cin>>a[i];
       ctr+=(a[i]/(i+1));
       }
       if(ctr%2!=0)
       cout<<"ALICE\n";
       else cout<<"BOB\n";
   }
   return 0;
}
